this_title: The Loneliest Girl in the Universe
introduction: The Loneliest Girl in the Universe follows Romy Silvers, the only surviving crew-member of a spaceship travelling to a new planet, on a mission to establish a second home for humanity. Alone in space,she is the loneliest girl in the universe until she hears about a new ship which has launched from Earth – with a single passenger on board. A boy called J.
foreign_title: The Loneliest Girl in the Universe
